title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8191 - Real Property Transfers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8191 - Real Property Transfers

State Regulations

Subpart 8191-1 - General Provisions (§ 8191-1.2)

Subpart 8191-2 - Form And Manner Of Reporting Real Property Transfers (§ 8191-2.1 to 8191-2.5)

Subpart 8191-3 - Residential Assessment Ratios (§ 8191-3.1 to 8191-3.3)

Subpart 8191-4 - Verification Of Sales For Use As Observations In The Measurement Of Municipal Full Value (§ 8191-4.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8191

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 504, 574[1]- [2], 738, 1570, 1805[5]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
